name: Zentopia
description:
Zentopia is a low-poly 3D first person shooter that has you guiding kitties with lasers while managing the state of an entire timeline. 

You play as a time-travelling tech-monk who's chasing his pet organobots back to the past to where they fled. These robot kitties have a special attraction to bonsai, since they think it's robot catnip! His objective is to recover them without changing the timeline, trying to keep everything intact with his trusted holo-orb. With this old orb he can water the bonsai back to health, point the bots back to his time capsule with a laser, or even shoot down the time police that came to put an end to this whole mess.

This project was developed in two weeks, as a part of programming classes back in March 2020, being the first 3D game I've ever made.

I worked on the game and level design, and C# coding.
